children.name: Total County Employment
children.source: NACo Analysis of U.S. Census Bureau - Census of Individual Governments: Employment

children.name: Total County Employment
children.definition: The number of full-time and part-time employees for a county.

children.name: Total County Full-time Employment
children.definition: The number of full-time employees for a county.

children.name: Total County Part-time Employment
children.definition: The number of part-time employees for a county.

children.name: Administration Employment
children.source: NACo Analysis of U.S. Census Bureau - Census of Individual Governments: Employment

children.name: Total Administration Employment
children.definition: Number of full-time and part-time employees working on financial administration, social insurance administration and other governmental administration.

children.name: Total Administration Full-time Employment
children.definition: Number of full-time employees working on financial administration, social insurance administration and other governmental administration.

children.name: Total Administration Part-time Employment
children.definition: Number of part-time employees working on financial administration, social insurance administration and other governmental administration.

children.name: Financial Administration
children.definition: Number of full-time and part-time employees working on official and central staff agencies concerned with tax assessment and collection, accounting, auditing, budgeting, purchasing, custody of funds, and other finance activities.

children.name: Financial Administration Full-time
children.definition: Number of full-time employees working on official and central staff agencies concerned with tax assessment and collection, accounting, auditing, budgeting, purchasing, custody of funds, and other finance activities.

children.name: Financial Administration Part-time
children.definition: Number of part-time employees working on official and central staff agencies concerned with tax assessment and collection, accounting, auditing, budgeting, purchasing, custody of funds, and other finance activities.

children.name: Other Governmental Administration
children.definition: Number of full-time and part-time employees working on government-wide executive, administrative, and staff service agencies other than financial, judicial, legal, and Federal or state legislative activities.

children.name: Other Governmental Administration Full-time
children.definition: Number of full-time employees working on government-wide executive, administrative, and staff service agencies other than financial, judicial, legal, and Federal or state legislative activities.

children.name: Other Governmental Administration Part-time
children.definition: Number of part-time employees working on government-wide executive, administrative, and staff service agencies other than financial, judicial, legal, and Federal or state legislative activities.

children.name: Social Insurance Administration
children.definition: Number of full-time and part-time employees working on administration of unemployment compensation systems, public employment services, and the Federal Social Security, Medicare, and Railroad Retirement trusts. Includes employees of unemployment compensation, unemployment insurance, and equivalent agencies involved in administering the cooperative Federal-state unemployment compensation  system.

children.name: Social Insurance Administration Full-time
children.definition: Number of full-time employees working on administration of unemployment compensation systems, public employment services, and the Federal Social Security, Medicare, and Railroad Retirement trusts. Includes employees of unemployment compensation, unemployment insurance, and equivalent agencies involved in administering the cooperative Federal-state unemployment compensation  system.

children.name: Social Insurance Administration Part-time
children.definition: Number of part-time employees working on administration of unemployment compensation systems, public employment services, and the Federal Social Security, Medicare, and Railroad Retirement trusts. Includes employees of unemployment compensation, unemployment insurance, and equivalent agencies involved in administering the cooperative Federal-state unemployment compensation  system.

children.name: Education Employment
children.source: NACo Analysis of U.S. Census Bureau - Census of Individual Governments: Employment

children.name: Total Education Employment
children.definition: Number of full-time and part-time employees working on elementary, secondary and higher education.

children.name: Total Education Full-time Employment
children.definition: Number of full-time employees working on elementary, secondary and higher education.

children.name: Total Education Part-time Employment
children.definition: Number of part-time employees working on elementary, secondary and higher education.

children.name: Elementary & Secondary Education
children.definition: Number of full-time and part-time employees working on the operation, maintenance, and construction of public schools and facilities for elementary and secondary education (kindergarten through high school), vocational-technical education, and other educational institutions except those for higher education. Covers operations by independent governments (school districts) as well as those operated as integral agencies of state, county, municipal, or township governments. Also covers financial support of public elementary and secondary schools.

children.name: Elementary & Secondary Education Full-time
children.definition: Number of full-time employees working on the operation, maintenance, and construction of public schools and facilities for elementary and secondary education (kindergarten through high school), vocational-technical education, and other educational institutions except those for higher education. Covers operations by independent governments (school districts) as well as those operated as integral agencies of state, county, municipal, or township governments. Also covers financial support of public elementary and secondary schools.

children.name: Elementary & Secondary Education Part-time
children.definition: Number of part-time employees working on the operation, maintenance, and construction of public schools and facilities for elementary and secondary education (kindergarten through high school), vocational-technical education, and other educational institutions except those for higher education. Covers operations by independent governments (school districts) as well as those operated as integral agencies of state, county, municipal, or township governments. Also covers financial support of public elementary and secondary schools.

children.name: Higher Education
children.definition: Number of full-time and part-time employees working on higher education auxiliary enterprises: higher education activities and facilities that provide supplementary services to students, faculty or staff, and which are self-supported (wholly or largely through charges for services) and operated  on a commercial basis. Includes: dormitories; cafeterias; bookstores; athletic facilities, contests, or events; student activities; lunch rooms; student health services; college unions; college stores, and the like. Other Higher Education: Degree-granting institutions (associate, bachelor, master, or doctorate) operated by state or local governments that provide academic training beyond the high school (grade 12) level, other than for auxiliary enterprises of the state or local institution.

children.name: Higher Education Full-time
children.definition: Number of full-time employees working on higher education auxiliary enterprises: higher education activities and facilities that provide supplementary services to students, faculty or staff, and which are self-supported (wholly or largely through charges for services) and operated  on a commercial basis. Includes: dormitories; cafeterias; bookstores; athletic facilities, contests, or events; student activities; lunch rooms; student health services; college unions; college stores, and the like. Other Higher Education: Degree-granting institutions (associate, bachelor, master, or doctorate) operated by state or local governments that provide academic training beyond the high school (grade 12) level, other than for auxiliary enterprises of the state or local institution.

children.name: Higher Education Part-time
children.definition: Number of part-time employees working on higher education auxiliary enterprises: higher education activities and facilities that provide supplementary services to students, faculty or staff, and which are self-supported (wholly or largely through charges for services) and operated  on a commercial basis. Includes: dormitories; cafeterias; bookstores; athletic facilities, contests, or events; student activities; lunch rooms; student health services; college unions; college stores, and the like. Other Higher Education: Degree-granting institutions (associate, bachelor, master, or doctorate) operated by state or local governments that provide academic training beyond the high school (grade 12) level, other than for auxiliary enterprises of the state or local institution.

children.name: Health & Hospitals Employment
children.source: NACo Analysis of U.S. Census Bureau - Census of Individual Governments: Employment

children.name: Total Health & Hospitals Employment
children.definition: Number of full-time and part-time employees working in hospitals or  providing health services.

children.name: Total Health & Hospitals Full-time Employment
children.definition: Number of full-time employees working in hospitals or  providing health services.

children.name: Total Health & Hospitals Part-time Employment
children.definition: Number of part-time employees working in hospitals or  providing health services.

children.name: Health
children.definition: Number of full-time and part-time employees working on provision of services for the conservation and improvement of public health, other than hospital care, and support of other governments’ health programs.

children.name: Health Full-time
children.definition: Number of full-time employees working on provision of services for the conservation and improvement of public health, other than hospital care, and support of other governments’ health programs.

children.name: Health Part-time
children.definition: Number of part-time employees working on provision of services for the conservation and improvement of public health, other than hospital care, and support of other governments’ health programs.

children.name: Hospitals
children.definition: Number of full-time and part-time employees working on services provided from a government’s own hospitals as well as expenditures for the provision of care in other hospitals (public or private). Own hospitals are facilities directly administered by the government, including those operated by public universities. Other expenditures cover the provision of care in other hospitals and support of other public and private hospitals.

children.name: Hospitals Full-time
children.definition: Number of full-time employees working on services provided from a government’s own hospitals as well as expenditures for the provision of care in other hospitals (public or private). Own hospitals are facilities directly administered by the government, including those operated by public universities. Other expenditures cover the provision of care in other hospitals and support of other public and private hospitals.

children.name: Hospitals Part-time
children.definition: Number of part-time employees working on services provided from a government’s own hospitals as well as expenditures for the provision of care in other hospitals (public or private). Own hospitals are facilities directly administered by the government, including those operated by public universities. Other expenditures cover the provision of care in other hospitals and support of other public and private hospitals.

children.name: Housing & Community Development Employment
children.source: NACo Analysis of U.S. Census Bureau - Census of Individual Governments: Employment

children.name: Housing & Community Development Employment
children.definition: Number of full-time and part-time employees working on construction, operation, and support of housing and redevelopment projects and other activities to promote or aid public and private housing and community development.  Includes: Housing: Planning, construction, furnishing, and operation of public housing projects (generally for persons not adequately served by private sector). Community development: Urban renewal and slum clearance; redevelopment and rehabilitation of substandard or deteriorated facilities and areas; rural redevelopment; and revitalization of commercial areas.

children.name: Housing & Community Development Full-time Employment
children.definition: Number of full-time employees working on construction, operation, and support of housing and redevelopment projects and other activities to promote or aid public and private housing and community development.  Includes: Housing: Planning, construction, furnishing, and operation of public housing projects (generally for persons not adequately served by private sector). Community development: Urban renewal and slum clearance; redevelopment and rehabilitation of substandard or deteriorated facilities and areas; rural redevelopment; and revitalization of commercial areas.

children.name: Housing & Community Development Part-time Employment
children.definition: Number of part-time employees working on construction, operation, and support of housing and redevelopment projects and other activities to promote or aid public and private housing and community development.  Includes: Housing: Planning, construction, furnishing, and operation of public housing projects (generally for persons not adequately served by private sector). Community development: Urban renewal and slum clearance; redevelopment and rehabilitation of substandard or deteriorated facilities and areas; rural redevelopment; and revitalization of commercial areas.

children.name: Justice & Public Safety Employment
children.source: NACo Analysis of U.S. Census Bureau - Census of Individual Governments: Employment

children.name: Total Justice & Public Safety Employment
children.definition: Number of full-time and part-time employees working on correction, judicial and legal services, police protection and fire protection.

children.name: Total Justice & Public Safety Full-time Employment
children.definition: Number of full-time employees working on correction, judicial and legal services, police protection and fire protection.

children.name: Total Justice & Public Safety Part-time Employment
children.definition: Number of part-time employees working on correction, judicial and legal services, police protection and fire protection.

children.name: Corrections
children.definition: Number of full-time and part-time employees working on correctional institutions: residential institutions or facilities for the confinement, correction, and rehabilitation of convicted adults, or juveniles adjudicated, delinquent or in need of supervision, and for the detention of adults and juveniles charged with a crime and awaiting trial. Other corrections including correctional activities other than Federal, state and local residential institutions or facilities.

children.name: Corrections Full-time
children.definition: Number of full-time employees working on correctional institutions: residential institutions or facilities for the confinement, correction, and rehabilitation of convicted adults, or juveniles adjudicated, delinquent or in need of supervision, and for the detention of adults and juveniles charged with a crime and awaiting trial. Other corrections including correctional activities other than Federal, state and local residential institutions or facilities.

children.name: Corrections Part-time
children.definition: Number of part-time employees working on correctional institutions: residential institutions or facilities for the confinement, correction, and rehabilitation of convicted adults, or juveniles adjudicated, delinquent or in need of supervision, and for the detention of adults and juveniles charged with a crime and awaiting trial. Other corrections including correctional activities other than Federal, state and local residential institutions or facilities.

children.name: Judicial & Legal Services
children.definition: Number of full-time and part-time employees working on courts (criminal and civil) and activities associated with courts, legal services, and legal counseling of indigent or other needy persons.

children.name: Judicial & Legal Services Full-time
children.definition: Number of full-time employees working on courts (criminal and civil) and activities associated with courts, legal services, and legal counseling of indigent or other needy persons.

children.name: Judicial & Legal Services Part-time
children.definition: Number of part-time employees working on courts (criminal and civil) and activities associated with courts, legal services, and legal counseling of indigent or other needy persons.

children.name: Police Protection
children.definition: Number of full-time and part-time employees working on general police, sheriff, state police, and other governmental departments that preserve law and order, protect persons and property from illegal acts, and work to prevent, control, investigate, and reduce crime.

children.name: Police Protection Full-time
children.definition: Number of full-time employees working on general police, sheriff, state police, and other governmental departments that preserve law and order, protect persons and property from illegal acts, and work to prevent, control, investigate, and reduce crime.

children.name: Police Protection Part-time
children.definition: Number of part-time employees working on general police, sheriff, state police, and other governmental departments that preserve law and order, protect persons and property from illegal acts, and work to prevent, control, investigate, and reduce crime.

children.name: Fire Protection
children.definition: Number of full-time and part-time employees working on prevention, avoidance, and suppression of fires and provision of ambulance, medical, rescue, or auxiliary services provided by fire protection agencies. This includes regular fire departments; financial, technical, and operational support of volunteer fire forces; fire hydrant maintenance; rescue squads; fire inspection, investigation, and regulation; fire marshals; fire prevention education; fire suppression training; auxiliary services; and the following activities if handled by a fire department: ambulances, emergency medical technicians (EMTs), paramedic squads, and arson investigation. This excludes forest-fire protection and suppression; ambulances, emergency medical technicians, and paramedic squads handled by non-fire departments.

children.name: Fire Protection Full-time
children.definition: Number of full-time employees working on prevention, avoidance, and suppression of fires and provision of ambulance, medical, rescue, or auxiliary services provided by fire protection agencies. This includes regular fire departments; financial, technical, and operational support of volunteer fire forces; fire hydrant maintenance; rescue squads; fire inspection, investigation, and regulation; fire marshals; fire prevention education; fire suppression training; auxiliary services; and the following activities if handled by a fire department: ambulances, emergency medical technicians (EMTs), paramedic squads, and arson investigation. This excludes forest-fire protection and suppression; ambulances, emergency medical technicians, and paramedic squads handled by non-fire departments.

children.name: Fire Protection Part-time
children.definition: Number of part-time employees working on prevention, avoidance, and suppression of fires and provision of ambulance, medical, rescue, or auxiliary services provided by fire protection agencies. This includes regular fire departments; financial, technical, and operational support of volunteer fire forces; fire hydrant maintenance; rescue squads; fire inspection, investigation, and regulation; fire marshals; fire prevention education; fire suppression training; auxiliary services; and the following activities if handled by a fire department: ambulances, emergency medical technicians (EMTs), paramedic squads, and arson investigation. This excludes forest-fire protection and suppression; ambulances, emergency medical technicians, and paramedic squads handled by non-fire departments.

children.name: Public Amenity Employment
children.source: NACo Analysis of U.S. Census Bureau - Census of Individual Governments: Employment

children.name: Total Public Amenity Employment
children.definition: Number of full-time and part-time employees working on libraries, parks and recreation, as well as other natural resources.

children.name: Total Public Amenity Full-time Employment
children.definition: Number of full-time employees working on libraries, parks and recreation, as well as other natural resources.

children.name: Total Public Amenity Part-time Employment
children.definition: Number of part-time employees working on libraries, parks and recreation, as well as other natural resources.

children.name: Libraries
children.definition: Number of full-time and part-time employees working on the establishment and provision of libraries for use by the general public and the technical support of privately-operated libraries. Includes: Public libraries, community libraries, consolidated libraries, regional libraries, and their variously-named equivalents; library extension services including bookmobiles; public library (special) districts; U.S. Library of Congress (including Copyright Office); state library commissions and boards; programs to promote, develop, and coordinate library services and facilities.

children.name: Libraries Full-time
children.definition: Number of full-time employees working on the establishment and provision of libraries for use by the general public and the technical support of privately-operated libraries. Includes: Public libraries, community libraries, consolidated libraries, regional libraries, and their variously-named equivalents; library extension services including bookmobiles; public library (special) districts; U.S. Library of Congress (including Copyright Office); state library commissions and boards; programs to promote, develop, and coordinate library services and facilities.

children.name: Libraries Part-time
children.definition: Number of part-time employees working on the establishment and provision of libraries for use by the general public and the technical support of privately-operated libraries. Includes: Public libraries, community libraries, consolidated libraries, regional libraries, and their variously-named equivalents; library extension services including bookmobiles; public library (special) districts; U.S. Library of Congress (including Copyright Office); state library commissions and boards; programs to promote, develop, and coordinate library services and facilities.

children.name: Natural Resources
children.definition: Number of full-time and part-time employees working on conservation, promotion, and development of natural resources (soil, water, energy, minerals, etc.) and the regulation of industries which develop, utilize, or affect natural resources. Includes: Employees engaged in irrigation; drainage; flood control; soil conservation and reclamation including prevention of soil erosion; surveying, development, and regulation of water resources; regulation of mineral resources and related industries including land reclamation; wetlands and watershed management and protection; geological surveying and mapping; regulation of gas and oil drilling and production; dam and reservoir safety; public education programs related to the above; fairs; technical assistance to private or other governmental efforts in these areas.

children.name: Natural Resources Full-time
children.definition: Number of full-time employees working on conservation, promotion, and development of natural resources (soil, water, energy, minerals, etc.) and the regulation of industries which develop, utilize, or affect natural resources. Includes: Employees engaged in irrigation; drainage; flood control; soil conservation and reclamation including prevention of soil erosion; surveying, development, and regulation of water resources; regulation of mineral resources and related industries including land reclamation; wetlands and watershed management and protection; geological surveying and mapping; regulation of gas and oil drilling and production; dam and reservoir safety; public education programs related to the above; fairs; technical assistance to private or other governmental efforts in these areas.

children.name: Natural Resources Part-time
children.definition: Number of part-time employees working on conservation, promotion, and development of natural resources (soil, water, energy, minerals, etc.) and the regulation of industries which develop, utilize, or affect natural resources. Includes: Employees engaged in irrigation; drainage; flood control; soil conservation and reclamation including prevention of soil erosion; surveying, development, and regulation of water resources; regulation of mineral resources and related industries including land reclamation; wetlands and watershed management and protection; geological surveying and mapping; regulation of gas and oil drilling and production; dam and reservoir safety; public education programs related to the above; fairs; technical assistance to private or other governmental efforts in these areas.

children.name: Parks & Recreation
children.definition: Number of full-time and part-time employees working on provision and support of recreational and cultural-scientific facilities maintained for the benefit of residents and visitors.

children.name: Parks & Recreation Full-time
children.definition: Number of full-time employees working on provision and support of recreational and cultural-scientific facilities maintained for the benefit of residents and visitors.

children.name: Parks & Recreation Part-time
children.definition: Number of part-time employees working on provision and support of recreational and cultural-scientific facilities maintained for the benefit of residents and visitors.

children.definition: Number of full-time and part-time employees working on support of and assistance to needy persons contingent upon their need.

children.name: Public Welfare Full-time Employment
children.definition: Number of full-time employees working on support of and assistance to needy persons contingent upon their need.

children.name: Public Welfare Part-time Employment

children.name: Transportation Employment
children.source: NACo Analysis of U.S. Census Bureau - Census of Individual Governments: Employment

children.name: Total Transportation Employment
children.definition: Number of full-time and part-time employees involved in air transporation, highways, transit, as well as water transport and terminals.

children.name: Total Transportation Full-time Employment
children.definition: Number of full-time employees involved in air transporation, highways, transit, as well as water transport and terminals.

children.name: Total Transportation Part-time Employment
children.definition: Number of part-time employees involved in air transporation, highways, transit, as well as water transport and terminals.

children.name: Air Transportation
children.definition: Number of full-time and part-time employees  involved in the provision, operation, construction, and support of airport facilities serving the public at-large on a scheduled or unscheduled basis. Also includes the regulation of airline industry, if applicable.

children.name: Air Transportation Full-time
children.definition: Number of full-time employees  involved in the provision, operation, construction, and support of airport facilities serving the public at-large on a scheduled or unscheduled basis. Also includes the regulation of airline industry, if applicable.

children.name: Air Transportation Part-time
children.definition: Number of part-time employees  involved in the provision, operation, construction, and support of airport facilities serving the public at-large on a scheduled or unscheduled basis. Also includes the regulation of airline industry, if applicable.

children.name: Highways
children.definition: Number of full-time and part-time employees involed in maintenance, operation, repair, and construction of highways, streets, roads, alleys, sidewalks, bridges, tunnels, ferry boats, and related structures, including those operated on a toll basis.

children.name: Highways Full-time
children.definition: Number of full-time employees involed in maintenance, operation, repair, and construction of highways, streets, roads, alleys, sidewalks, bridges, tunnels, ferry boats, and related structures, including those operated on a toll basis.

children.name: Highways Part-time
children.definition: Number of part-time employees involed in maintenance, operation, repair, and construction of highways, streets, roads, alleys, sidewalks, bridges, tunnels, ferry boats, and related structures, including those operated on a toll basis.

children.name: Water Transport & Terminals
children.definition: Number of full-time and part-time employees involved in provision, construction, operation, maintenance, and support of public waterways, harbors, docks, wharves, and related marine terminal facilities. Regulation of the water transportation industry.

children.name: Water Transport & Terminals Full-time
children.definition: Number of full-time employees involved in provision, construction, operation, maintenance, and support of public waterways, harbors, docks, wharves, and related marine terminal facilities. Regulation of the water transportation industry.

children.name: Water Transport & Terminals Part-time
children.definition: Number of part-time employees involved in provision, construction, operation, maintenance, and support of public waterways, harbors, docks, wharves, and related marine terminal facilities. Regulation of the water transportation industry.

children.name: Transit
children.definition: Number of full-time and part-time employees involved in the operation, maintenance, and construction of public mass transit systems, including subways, surface rails, and buses.

children.name: Transit Full-time
children.definition: Number of full-time employees involved in the operation, maintenance, and construction of public mass transit systems, including subways, surface rails, and buses.

children.name: Transit Part-time
children.definition: Number of part-time employees involved in the operation, maintenance, and construction of public mass transit systems, including subways, surface rails, and buses.

children.name: Total Utility Full-time Employment
children.definition: Number of full-time employees working on electric and gas utilities.

children.name: Total Utility Part-time Employment

children.name: Electric Utilities
children.definition: Number of full-time and part-time employees working on operation, maintenance, and construction of public electric power systems, including production, acquisition, and distribution of electricity to general public or to other public or private utilities.

children.name: Electric Utilities Full-time
children.definition: Number of full-time employees working on operation, maintenance, and construction of public electric power systems, including production, acquisition, and distribution of electricity to general public or to other public or private utilities.

children.name: Electric Utilities Part-time

This function covers government gas supply activities for residential, commercial, and industrial gas usage.

children.name: Gas Utilities Full-time
children.definition: Number of full-time employees working on operation, maintenance, and construction of public natural gas supply systems, including production, acquisition, and distribution of gas to general public or to other public or private utilities. This function covers government gas supply activities for residential, commercial, and industrial gas usage.

children.name: Gas Utilities Part-time
children.definition: Number of part-time employees working on operation, maintenance, and construction of public natural gas supply systems, including production, acquisition, and distribution of gas to general public or to other public or private utilities. This function covers government gas supply activities for residential, commercial, and industrial gas usage.

children.source: NACo Analysis of U.S. Census Bureau - Census of Individual Governments: Employment

children.definition: Number of full-time employees working on sewerage, solid waste management and water utilties.

children.definition: Number of full-time employees working on provision, maintenance, and operation of sanitary and storm sewer systems and sewage disposal and treatment facilities, as well as all intergovernmental payments for such activities.

children.name: Sewerage Part-time

children.definition: Number of full-time employees working on collection, removal, and disposal of garbage, refuse, hazardous, and other solid wastes and the cleaning of streets, alleys, and sidewalks.

children.definition: Number of part-time employees working on collection, removal, and disposal of garbage, refuse, hazardous, and other solid wastes and the cleaning of streets, alleys, and sidewalks.

children.name: Water Utilities

children.definition: Number of full-time employees working on operation, maintenance, and construction of public water supply systems, whether for distribution of water to the general public or to other public or private utilities. This function covers government water supply activities for residential, commercial, and industrial water usage.

children.definition: Number of full-time employees working on activities not applicable to other general functions, or multi-functional general sector activities that cannot be separated into specific functions.
